IAmTheHost
A flag indicating if this Presence is the host.

Constructor callable only from within package.

myUnum 
 private Unum myUnum
The Unum which this Presence represents.

IAmTheHost 
 protected boolean IAmTheHost
A flag indicating if this Presence is the host.

Presence 
 Presence(Unum unum,
          boolean isHost)
Constructor callable only from within package. The only caller should be the class Unum. The result is a new presence of a given unum.

Parameters:
unum - The unum we are to be a presence of
isHost - true=>create a host presence, false=>create a client

send 
 public void send(String message,
                  Object args[]) throws UnumException
Invoke a presence-level method

Parameters:
message - Message to deliver
args - Message arguments
Throws: UnumException
from Unum.presenceSend()
